articles.title: Capitals get huge two points in road battle with league's best: numbers for the morning after - Russian Machine Never Breaks
articles.description: The Washington Capitals matched up with the NHL's best in the Colorado Avalanche on Tuesday night and took the Avs down in a thrilling 3-2 victory. The Caps are now 6-1 in their last seven games and that stretch includes...
